TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that has been studied as an anticancer drug. It is an analog of a substance that occurs naturally in the body (cyclic adenosine monophosphate).

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio como medicamento contra el cáncer. Es un análogo de una sustancia que se presenta naturalmente en el cuerpo (monofosfato cíclico de adenosina).
